definitions.description: Stores the actual quantity information from water transactions within the organization.

constantValues: Stores the actual quantity information from water transactions within the organization.

members.name: waterquantityId
members.description: Unique identifier for entity instances.

members.name: TTLInSeconds
members.description: Time to live in seconds.

members.name: partitionId
members.description: Logical partition identifier. A logical partition consists of a set of records with same partition ID.

constantValues: Logical partition identifier. A logical partition consists of a set of records with same partition ID.

members.name: createdOn
members.description: Date and time when the record was created.

constantValues: Date and time when the record was created.

members.name: modifiedOn
members.description: Date and time when the record was modified.

constantValues: Date and time when the record was modified.

members.name: importSequenceNumber
members.description: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

constantValues: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

members.name: overriddenCreatedOn
members.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

constantValues: Date and time that the record was migrated.

members.name: name
members.description: The name of the custom entity.

constantValues: The name of the custom entity.

members.name: activityentityname
members.description: Internal reference used to map an entity to the corresponding record.

constantValues: Internal reference used to map an entity to the corresponding record.

members.name: activityid
members.description: Internal reference used to map the entity to the corresponding record.

constantValues: Internal reference used to map the entity to the corresponding record.

members.name: activityname
members.description: Category or reference data used for reporting purposes and populated during the calculation process.

constantValues: Category or reference data used for reporting purposes and populated during the calculation process.

members.name: description
members.description: Optional field to describe the entity.

constantValues: Optional field to describe the entity.

members.name: origincorrelationid
members.description: Optional field to store source unique identifier values for the entity.

constantValues: Optional field to store source unique identifier values for the entity.

members.name: quantity
members.description: Indicates the actual quantity of water that was part of the transaction.

constantValues: Indicates the actual quantity of water that was part of the transaction.

members.name: transactionenddate
members.description: Indicates the date and time at which the transaction recording ended.

constantValues: Indicates the date and time at which the transaction recording ended.

members.name: transactionstartdate
members.description: Indicates the date and time at which the transaction recording started.

constantValues: Indicates the date and time at which the transaction recording started.

members.name: evidence
members.description: Optional field to indicate the origin for the water quantity data.

constantValues: Optional field to indicate the origin for the water quantity data.

members.name: unit
members.description: Indicates the unit of measurement for the water transaction.

constantValues: Indicates the unit of measurement for the water transaction.

members.name: waterinstrument
members.description: Describes the corresponding water instrument for which the water quantity information is being recorded.

constantValues: Describes the corresponding water instrument for which the water quantity information is being recorded.

members.name: dataqualitytype
members.description: Description of the data quality that identifies whether the data is metered, measured, or estimated.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'dataqualitytype_display' is added to the 'WaterQuantity' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'dataqualitytype'
supportingAttribute.name: dataqualitytype_display

constantValues: Description of the data quality that identifies whether the data is metered, measured, or estimated.

members.name: facility
members.description: Indicates the facility mapped to the water instrument.

constantValues: Indicates the facility mapped to the water instrument.

members.name: industrialprocesstype
members.description: Indicates the process for which the water instrument is being used.

constantValues: Indicates the process for which the water instrument is being used.

members.name: organizationalunit
members.description: Indicates the organizational unit where the water instrument is located.

constantValues: Indicates the organizational unit where the water instrument is located.

members.name: watersource
members.description: Indicates the source from which the water enters or leaves the instrument.

constantValues: Indicates the source from which the water enters or leaves the instrument.

members.name: watertransactiontype
members.description: Indicates the type of transaction related to water flow, such as withdrawal, discharge, consumption, or recycled.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'watertransactiontype_display' is added to the 'WaterQuantity' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'watertransactiontype'
supportingAttribute.name: watertransactiontype_display

constantValues: Indicates the type of transaction related to water flow, such as withdrawal, discharge, consumption, or recycled.
